title: LTB S74 Silks with ad backs
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: LTB S74 Silks with ad backs
posts.post_content: Hi . I am searching for some nicer S-74 type 1 white silks with the advertising backs . I have most of the set and am looking for the handful I need, but would consider upgrades . Please contact me with which ones you  have and some prices. Thanks!
